price: Kuma suka ce: "Mẽne ne ga wannan Manzo, yanã cin abinci, kuma yanã tafiya a cikin kãsuwanni! Don me ba a saukar da malã'ika zuwa gare shi ba, dõmin ya kasance mai gargaɗi tãre da shi?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلرَّسُولِ يَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشِي فِي ٱلۡأَسۡوَاقِ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِ مَلَكٞ فَيَكُونَ مَعَهُۥ نَذِيرًا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū māli hādhā al-rasūli yakulu al-ṭaʿāma wayamshī fī al-aswāqi lawlā unzila ilayhi malakun fayakūna maʿahu nadhīran
